name: brawlHotaObjects
description:
Modified HotA objects used by template Brawl, should be better suited for short games on small maps.
Churchyard: defended by 3x 8-15 Halflings and 3x 80-150 Peasants, reward: 800-1500 gold, minor artifact, 4-8 walking deads/zombies,
Mansion: 5-8 Vampire Lords, reward: minor art, 2-3 resources, 1200-1800 gold,
Red Tower: 5x 2-5 water elementals, reward 3-6 air elementals,
Experimental Workshop: 5x 2 Stone-Gold Golems, reward: 3 Golems,
Wolf Rider Picket: 4x 6-12 Goblins and 6-12 Wolf Riders, reward: 2-3 Wood and Ore and 3-6 Orcs,
Pirate Cavern: 2x 2-4 Pirates, 2x 2-3 Corsairs, or 4x 1 special Sea Dog (better get him before he moves!) reward: 3-6 Stormbirds or 1 Nix, 3-7 Gold,
Ivory Tower: 2x 12-20 Gremlins, 3x 3-6 Gargoyles, reward: 3-6 Gargoyles and 1 Mage,
Spit: 2x 2-3 Basilisks, 2x 1 Gorgon, reward: 1000-2000 Gold, 1 Basilisk, 1 Basilisk or Gorgon.
Ruins: value up to 3000, rarity down to 50, zone limit down to 1, revisitable like the rest, guards and rewards untouched.
All creatures that have upgrades, both guards and rewards have a chance of being upgraded.
All banks recharge after 4 full days pass.
They are not designed to be taken with your whole army but with parts of your army in multiple places at once.
